initiative: This initiative aims at establishing world-wide direct democracy in order to bring peace, freedom, safety and prosperity to humanity, including saving the climate and the biodiversity. The principle is that people will become citizens by proposing referundums and voting regardless of any official acknowledgement. Vote results from a limited number of citizens could be considered as simple survey results. They could feed debates, influence political decisions and foster more people to become citizens. Vote results from areas where a majority of people are citizens will become significant from a democratic point of view. This will increase the pressure on governments to respect the democratic choices expressed by their people. Ultimately, this bottom-up initiative will enforce direct democracy everywhere in the world.
features:
The proposed system implements the following necessary features:
  • available to anybody equipped with a smartphone.
  • anybody can propose referendums and petitions.
  • fully decentralized: nobody can control it.
  • supported by a web of trust: distributed reputation system.
  • publicly verifiable referendums: check that my anonymous vote was taken into account, check that others didn't cheat.
  • publicly verifiable petitions: check that each signature corresponds to a real person, not just an e-mail address.
  • robust to attacks, resistant to vote buying and censorship.
  • relying on state-of-the-art cryptography.
  • free and open-source specifications and implementations.
  • easy-to-use user interfaces.
  • aimed at gaining confidence of both technical and non-technical people.
privacy: Becoming a citizen implies publishing a citizen card that includes your name, picture and GPS home address. This information will be published on the internet. This app will not share any other information about you.
contribute:
There are different way to contribute:
  • Propose a referendum or a petition and promote it.
  • Spread of the word about directdemocracy.vote.
  • Make a donation to support our development effort and infrastructure.
  • Host a webservice: a publisher, a trustee, a polling station or develop an app.
citizen-confirm: I confirm the above information is correct.
zoom-home-location: Zoom to building level to precisely select your home address
ask-others-to-endorse-you: Ask other citizens to endorse you to increase your reputation.
